summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Ingersol Place, from a point One hundred twenty (120) feet east of the east margin of Twentieth Avenue South, running east, to connection with a sewer in Twenty-first Avenue South, by constructing a sewer therein, of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, catch basins, flush tanks and other appurtenances, in accordance with Resolution No. 577 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
